job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Microsoft 365 Engineer, you will be part of the Unified Communication & Collaboration Area, which consists of four DevOps teams. You will work on our M365 Copilot Scale-up project. You will collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams. This role involves turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget. You'll keep projects moving, ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated. You'll lead tasks efficiently, solve problems as they come up, and work closely with the team and stakeholders. You'll need to adapt to changes and make sure all deliverables meet the required standards., * Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
     * Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
     * Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions and advise on data control
     * Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
     * Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines., * The opportunity to work on Microsoft Copilot scale-up and Microsoft 365 Copilot technical readiness projects.
     * An environment where you can develop yourself and expand your expertise.
     * Collaboration with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.
job_details.full_text:
Microsoft 365 Engineer - Copilot & Collaboration

As a Microsoft 365 Engineer, you will be part of the Unified Communication & Collaboration Area, which consists of four DevOps teams. You will work on our M365 Copilot Scale-up project. You will collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams. This role involves turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget. You'll keep projects moving, ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated. You'll lead tasks efficiently, solve problems as they come up, and work closely with the team and stakeholders. You'll need to adapt to changes and make sure all deliverables meet the required standards., * Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
     * Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
     * Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions and advise on data control
     * Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
     * Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines., * The opportunity to work on Microsoft Copilot scale-up and Microsoft 365 Copilot technical readiness projects.
     * An environment where you can develop yourself and expand your expertise.
     * Collaboration with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on the implementation and management of Microsoft 365 Copilot and SharePoint Online solutions, emphasizing collaboration, project management, and user support. While it involves AI tools (M365 Copilot), it does not indicate core development, fine-tuning, or deep technical modeling of AI models. The role appears to be more about configuring, deploying, and advising on the use of existing AI-powered productivity tools within a specific platform, aligning with the 'use of AI tools to enhance productivity' aspect of the Ambiguous profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget' and 'keep projects moving, ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated' directly relate to understanding business context, planning, and aligning technical work with project goals.
job_tasks.phrase: turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online' indicates a responsibility to understand and shape the application of technology within the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions' suggests hands-on work in deploying and configuring software solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform' points to software development activities to enhance existing platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint' directly relates to the operational aspects of software development and deployment within a DevOps framework.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines' involves understanding how business users can best leverage technology and adhering to organizational policies.
job_tasks.phrase: advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines
